ROM.Changelog:
### Changelog 20150929
* Latest Kexec Patch
* Pure Stock Armani-dev kernel n device trees [no hotplugs or governors nothing fancy added at all]
* a little tweak to the thermal
* OTA Support
Project name: android_kernel_xiaomi_armani *TheStrix - [PATCH] Implement kexec-hardboot *klozz - cpufreq: interactive: fix compiling warnings The gcc warns like: *franciscofranco - msm: thermal: add a module param to change the thermal throttle temperature point to userspace *Ruchi Kandoi - Power: Changes the permission to read only for sysfs file /sys/kernel/wakeup_reasons/last_resume_reason *Ruchi Kandoi - Power: Add guard condition for maximum wakeup reasons *Ruchi Kandoi - POWER: fix compile warnings in log_wakeup_reason *Ruchi Kandoi - Power: add an API to log wakeup reasons *fefifofum - ARM: dts: msm8226: Raise msm-thermal limit temp *Taniya Das - msm: acpuclock-8226: Limit DDR to 200MHz for APSS frequency *Ke Liu - msm: acpuclock-8226: update corner mapping for 1.2 and 1.4 GHz speedbins *Se Hun Kim - msm: mdss: Adding lcd notifier *fefifofum - f2fs: bring up to date with Jaegeuk's branch *fefifofum - armani: defconfig: Enable BFQ IO scheduler *Mauro Andreolini - block, bfq: add Early Queue Merge (EQM) to BFQ-v7r8 for 3.4.0 *Paolo Valente - block: introduce the BFQ-v7r8 I/O sched for 3.4 *Arianna Avanzini - block: cgroups, kconfig, build bits for BFQ-v7r8-3.4
Project name: android_device_xiaomi_armani *tarun93 - add OTA support *tarun93 - update power profile from the latest miui7 *tarun93 - audio: Change mixer control to set correct BTSCO Sample rate *tarun93 - init.armani.power.rc: Enable performance profiles and update power nodes *tarun93 - add my own optimizations entries to Boardconfig *tarun93 - adapt to EOS-5.1 *fefifofum - cpufreq: Disable io_is_busy *fefifofum - sepolicy: Address mpdecision and thermal denials *fefifofum - sepolicy: Address mpdecision denials *fefifofum - sepolicy: Address more denials *fefifofum - sepolicy: Address mediaserver denial *fefifofum - Update fingerprint to latest release *Krishna Vanka - CPUFreq: Set optimal frequency for msm8226 *fefifofum - sepolicy: Use correct permissions for CMHW *fefifofum - sepolicy: Remove display policy items *fefifofum - sepolicy: Cleanup system_server *fefifofum - Enable dex-preoptimization *fefifofum - Enable BFQ IO scheduler by default *fefifofum - Update fingerprint from latest official release *fefifofum - Show app install location option *fefifofum - Update fingerprint from latest official release *Kra1o5 - Add overlay for non-roaming operator *fefifofum - Use prebuilt libOmxVdecHevc *Ricardo Cerqueira - media: Switch to lower-end codecs
